verse: आलोड्य सर्वशास्त्राणि विचार्य च पुनः पुनः। इदमेकं सुनिष्पन्नं ध्येयो नारायणः हरिः॥

terms.सुनिष्पन्नं: (su: nishpannam) - well expressed or clearly comprehended
terms.ध्येयो: (dhyeyo): the object of meditation or focus
terms.नारायणः: (narayana): Lord Narayana, a name for the Supreme Being or Vishnu
terms.After examining all the scriptures and c: expressed and clearly comprehended form (of the Supreme Being) is to be meditated upon. That form is none other than Narayana or Hari, who is an epithet for Lord Vishnu.
